dc_description_s: The Natural Filter Buffer Priorities for Water Quality (Phosphorus / Sediment) layers identify priority forest/grass buffer opportunities by subwatershed (MD HUC 8). The Natural Filter Buffer Targeting layers were used as a baseline for suitability rankings. Land use, hydrology, soil, and landscape characteristics were analyzed to rank buffer opportunities with high phosphorus and sediment removal potential.Last Updated: 6/9/2014Feature Service Layer Link:http://geodata.md.gov/imap/rest/services/Environment/MD_NaturalFilters/MapServer/3
dc_title_s: Natural Filters - Phosphorus Sediment Buffer Priority: Maryland
